Posts.Content: Feb 13, 2019 10:47PM hollyman wrote: I’m 48 years old I went in for my mammogram like I had done so many times before . But this time they found something and then they did a mammogram. That was questionable and they did a biopsy. The results came in last Friday but I have my daughters baby reveal in 2 weeks and if I get bad news I would be so sad and I don’t want to ruin her special day. I have been putting off going in . But the wait is killing me not sure what to do . ?
Posts.Title: Waiting for my moms results usgirl hollyman
